features.name: FileUpload Component
features.description: Drag-and-drop audio file upload with validation (MP3/WAV, max 25MB). Displays file metadata (name, size, duration) and provides visual feedback with Brutalist design.

features.name: Audio Processing Workflow
features.description: Orchestrates the stem separation process. Manages state transitions (pending → processing → complete), displays progress indicators, and handles error recovery with retry functionality.

features.name: StemPlayer Component
features.description: Individual audio player for each separated stem (vocals, drums, bass, other). Features play/pause controls, volume adjustment, seek functionality via waveform, and download capability.

features.name: WaveformVisualizer
features.description: Canvas-based waveform visualization using Web Audio API. Shows playback progress with color changes and supports click-to-seek interaction. Lazy-loaded for performance.

features.name: StemGrid Component
features.description: Results page layout displaying all 4 separated stems in a grid. Includes 'Download All' button with sequential download functionality and state management.

features.name: API - File Upload
features.description: Next.js API route for handling multipart/form-data file uploads. Validates file size, type, and returns file metadata. Edge runtime for fast responses.

features.name: API - Audio Separation
features.description: Next.js API route (Node.js runtime) that spawns Python child process to execute Demucs model. Streams JSON progress updates and manages temporary file cleanup.

features.name: API - Health Check
features.description: Service health endpoint returning JSON status of API availability and backend readiness.

features.name: Navigation Header
features.description: Fixed top navigation with Brutalist badge logo, responsive menu, and scroll-to-section links. Implements mobile hamburger menu.

features.name: Homepage Landing
features.description: Hero section with massive typography, feature showcase grid, and 'How It Works' section. Includes CTA buttons and smooth scroll navigation.

features.name: Results Page
features.description: Post-processing page displaying success message, original filename, 4 stem players, usage tips, and action buttons (Process Another, Back to Home).

features.name: Audio Utilities
features.description: Helper functions for audio processing simulation, duration formatting, and mock stem separation with configurable delay and failure rate.

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: TypeScript interfaces for AudioFile, StemResult, ProcessingStatus, and ModelInfo. Includes STEM_CONFIG mapping and FILE_CONSTRAINTS validation rules.

features.name: Brutalist Design System
features.description: Global CSS defining Brutalist theme with pure black background, Spotify Red primary, hard shadows, zero border-radius, and custom animations (vinyl spin, pulse).

features.name: Progress Bar Component
features.description: Reusable progress indicator with percentage display, animated fill, and state-based styling (pending/processing/complete/error).

features.name: Bundle Optimization
features.description: Next.js dynamic imports configuration for lazy-loading heavy components (StemPlayer, FileUpload, WaveformVisualizer) to reduce initial page load.
